name: Jinbe
text: DON!! x1 When Attacking: If you have a character with a cost of 8 or more, KO up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less.

effect.text: If you have a character with a cost of 8 or more, KO up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less.
conditions: have a character with a cost of 8 or more
